V.iv.1.C.7.a
.
Grouping SC Disabilities
Group all disabilities subject to compensation under code 1, showing the
disabilities by current evaluation in descending order, and
DC followed by the diagnosis.
Note
:Â  In VBMS-R, disabilities are grouped automatically and carried forward from rating to rating.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section C - Coded Conclusion
citation: Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section C
